## Conversation Summary

### What We Did
- **Reorganized the TruckVisualization component layout** in `/home/user/project/components/TruckVisualization.tsx`
- **Moved the entire 3D visualization block to the right** of the calculation results
- **Restructured the CardContent section** using a grid layout (`xl:grid-cols-2`)

### Current Layout Structure
**Left Column (Results):**
- Statistics section with occupied dimensions and utilization metrics
- Enhanced cargo legend with color coding and detailed cargo information
- Both sections styled with dark backgrounds and improved visual hierarchy

**Right Column (3D Visualization):**
- 3D controls panel (joystick, sliders, reset button)
- Interactive 3D SVG model with truck cabin, chassis, and placed cargo
- All 3D-related functionality grouped together

### Key Improvements Made
- **Better organization**: Logical separation of calculation results from interactive visualization
- **Enhanced UX**: Users can now view stats while manipulating the 3D model side-by-side
- **Visual enhancements**: Added emojis, better section headers, and improved cargo list styling
- **Responsive design**: Grid layout that stacks on smaller screens

### Files Modified
- `/home/user/project/components/TruckVisualization.tsx` - Complete layout reorganization of the CardContent section

### Current State
The component now has a professional two-column layout where:
- Left side shows calculation results and cargo details
- Right side contains the interactive 3D visualization and controls
- Layout is responsive and maintains consistent dark theme styling

### Next Steps
The layout reorganization is complete. The component is ready for any further enhancements such as:
- Additional 3D visualization features
- More detailed statistics
- Enhanced interactivity
- Performance optimizations
